page.title: 06Spectator Sports in Llanelli
page.content: Llanelli is well known throughout all Rugby playing Countries for its Rugby team with their scarlet coloured jerseys.The team play their home matches on their own ground in this block.It is called Stradey Park.The name comes from the name of the large estate from whom the ground was purchased.The goal posts are each topped with a red saucepan.Llanelli was once renowned for its tin plate. The team are the holders this year of the Welsh Rugby Union Callenge Cup,and have now held it for a record five occasions. Llanelli Soccer team play at Stebonheath Park.The ground is owned by the Llanelli Town Council.The team play in red shirts and are in the Welsh League.There are several other rugby and soccer clubs in this block. We also have an indoor swimming pool.
